content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --EXFL
      operator: not_equal_to
      value: Y
    - name: --REASEX
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.149
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --REASEX is populated and --EXCLFL is not 'Y'
Outcome:
  Message: --REASEX may only be present when --EXCLFL is 'Y'
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '149'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The reason the result should be excluded from all
                  calculations. Used only when BWEXCLFL is Y.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 6.3.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when --REASEX is populated and --EXCLFL is not 'Y'

Outcome.Message: --REASEX may only be present when --EXCLFL is 'Y'

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The reason the result should be excluded from all calculations. Used only when BWEXCLFL is Y.
